/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Construction cranes can be seen in the distance, indicating the ongoing development and growth of the city. The street itself is lined with trees and street lamps, adding a touch of greenery and illumination to the scene. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the image. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the details of the cityscape.
